pullrequest.title: Do not export urdf symbols in sdformat 1.4 (-> sdf_1.4)

content.raw: It seems so. However if you are leaking more symbols such as the one reported before then they will be part of your ABI starting from the next release and removing the leaked symbols will then break the ABI at N+1. That's why it would probably be preferable to double check that the leaked symbols are really useful.
